根據Sportske Novosti。報導，國米邊後衛維沙積高確認，自己將傷缺8-10個月。

去年夏天，維沙積高租借加盟國米，租期為一個賽季，有可選擇買斷的條款。幾天前，維沙積高因為膝傷接受了手術，由於將傷缺8-10個月，這就意味著他的國米租借生涯已經宣告結束。

「這不是什麼秘密，恢復過程需要8個月-10個月，這對我這種手術類型是很正常的，手術進行得很順利，這是最重要的。」維沙積高表示。

「我能肯定地說，在我百分百恢復之前，我不會復出。在我經歷過這些所有問題，和所有的可怕感覺之後，我本可以徹底放棄足球。但我的首要任務是回到最佳狀態，並且回歸到比賽當中。」

「我不著急，我回歸的時候會比以往更強大。」

新浪飛機文 - 1
拿傑迪錫是走還是留？《每日體育報》援引《米蘭體育報》的消息稱，拿傑迪錫距離轉會已經越來越近，他距離加盟國米只剩下一步之遙。

報導指出，國米CEO馬路達和體育主管奧西里奧已經秘密地同巴塞的代表進行了談判，國米為拿傑迪錫開出了一份3500萬歐元的報價，不過這並沒有達到巴塞的心理期待值，巴塞方面認為拿傑迪錫的轉會費應該為4500萬歐元，雙方還有1000萬歐元的差異。如果雙方最終能夠就轉會達成協議，轉會費很有可能會在4000萬左右。

《米蘭體育報》還表示，拿傑迪錫本人已經和國米達成了協議，雙方將簽訂一份為期3年的合約，而年薪也會超過他在巴塞的年薪。目前，拿傑迪錫每年可以在巴塞拿到550萬歐元的薪水。

對於去留這個問題，拿傑迪錫本人曾表態不想離開，但是，迪莊已經確定將在夏天加盟巴塞，另外拉比奧也非常有可能在下季加盟巴塞，這兩名強援的到來，無疑會進一步擠壓拿傑迪錫的出場時間，這也讓他動了離隊的念頭。

新浪飛機文 - 2
旺達怒斥國米：伊卡迪帶傷踢足三個月
2月21日淩晨，國米官方公告稱伊卡迪膝蓋無傷病情況。球員的妻子兼經理人旺達對此不滿，她表示伊卡迪已經帶傷踢了三個月的比賽。

國米官方公告中，由於右膝疼痛，伊卡迪在當地時間今早接受了掃瞄檢查，檢查結果顯示，他的膝蓋情況與賽季前體檢時沒有顯著變化。這就意味著，這位阿根廷前鋒的膝蓋沒有受傷。

然而旺達對這樣的說法並不認同，她在ins上回應稱，伊卡迪前段時間一直是帶傷作戰。

旺達說：「請停止這樣的表述吧！我提醒你們，毛羅（伊卡迪）在作客與拉素的比賽後就受傷了，醫生建議他不要冒險，但他選擇繼續為國米踢聯賽和歐聯！」

國米作客與拉素的比賽是去年10月30日，按照旺達的說法，伊卡迪已經帶傷踢了三個多月。

“It was important to go through and we did it convincingly,” Ranocchia said in an interview with Sky Sport after the match.
“We are happy, but there’s still a long way to go and we want to reach the final of this competition.
“It’s certainly a response to the recent events from the group, we came together and brought out something extra.
“Sometimes you need to take a step back to go forward.”
It was a rare start for the Italian defender and he shared his delighted about being selected.
“I found out before the game that I would start. It’s not easy when you don’t play regularly, but I feel in good shape and it was a good game.“
I think my teammates like me! I try to prove myself and what I’m all about during the week, not just in a match situation, and do what is best for Inter.”
He then proceeded to speak on Mauro Icardi, who recently lost the Inter captaincy.
“Mauro is an Inter player, regardless of the captain’s armband. He has done so much for us in recent years, so of course we’ll welcome him back with open arms when he returns.”

Inter news: Icardi could require operation; next week crucial

Inter's star striker Mauro Icardi is still struggling with a painful knee, keeping him out of action. Through an official statement on the Nerazzurri's website, tests revealed that nothing has changed since they last did tests on him in the summer.

However, as a result of this, an operation could be on the cards. Icardi is experiencing pain and his return keeps getting delayed, thus an operation to clean his knee might be needed.

With that said, though, it would be a tough decision for the club to take, as his return would then be postponed to next season without a doubt. Next week there will be a new medical check, which could help provide the needed details to make a decision.

Hopefully for Inter, the physical therapy will help improve the situation. If not, then the Argentinian striker will seriously consider an operation to get ready for next season.

Inter news: Icardi could require operation; next week crucial

Inter's star striker Mauro Icardi is still struggling with a painful knee, keeping him out of action. Through an official statement on the Nerazzurri's website, tests revealed that nothing has changed since they last did tests on him in the summer.

However, as a result of this, an operation could be on the cards. Icardi is experiencing pain and his return keeps getting delayed, thus an operation to clean his knee might be needed.

With that said, though, it would be a tough decision for the club to take, as his return would then be postponed to next season without a doubt. Next week there will be a new medical check, which could help provide the needed details to make a decision.

Hopefully for Inter, the physical therapy will help improve the situation. If not, then the Argentinian striker will seriously consider an operation to get ready for next season.

In my story. At Inter. With Inter.

米蘭市長為國米收購出招：買下整支球隊吧

據安莎社報導，米蘭市長基奧斯比-薩拉表示他希望看到伊卡迪回歸賽場，並建議國際米蘭把整支阿特蘭大買下來。

在被國際米蘭剝奪隊長臂章之後，伊卡迪就再也沒有為球隊出場過，球員聲稱自己膝蓋有傷，現在仍在養傷當中。

米蘭市長則希望看到阿根廷射手快點回歸，他說道：「我想要伊卡迪回到場上，不過我對此不太樂觀，整件事讓我感到有點低落。」

薩拉還給國際米蘭提了一些收購方面的建議，他說道：「昨晚我看了阿特蘭大的比賽，我覺得他們表現得非常好。」

「與其想著要買這球員或那球員，國米應該把阿特蘭大整支隊買下來，解決我們的問題。」

「但無論如何，我還是想看伊卡迪上場。」

來自新浪飛機文

買真藍黑

Inter midfielder Matias Vecino’s automatic one game suspension for a yellow card accumulation has today been confirmed by sporting judge Gerardo Mastrandrea.The Uruguayan will miss Inter’s game this weekend against SPAL as a result of picking up a card in last Friday’s 2-1 loss in Sardinia against Cagliari but will be back for the Milan derby the following weekend.Mastrandrea also confirmed that Vecino’s Inter teammate Milan Skriniar, who was also booked against Cagliari, is among a number of players in the league that are one booking away from being handed an automatic suspension.With the Milan derby coming up as mentioned above, the Slovakian centre back could well be rested by Inter boss Luciano Spalletti for the game against SPAL because if he is to be carded and ends up suspended for the derby it will be a huge blow to Inter’s chances given his importance to the team.
